head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISBART, ANN BORKOVITZ

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISBART, ANN BORKOVITZ

block.p: WEISBART-Ann Borkovitz Harvey Crosby. On June 21, 2000 at home in Winston-Salem, NC after a long illness, age 72. Beloved daughter of Clara S. and William J. Borkovitz (deceased) of Winnetka, IL and Los Angeles, CA. Cherished sister of Peter E. Borkovitz (with Mary) of Yardley, PA. Devoted mother of Stephen Harvey (deceased), Karen E. Harvey, David C. Harvey (with Alexia), and Jennifer Crosby Tralongo (with Jack). Dear aunt, great aunt and cousin. Services will be held Friday, June 23, 2000 at 11:30 AM, Faith Chapel, Forest Lawn, Hollywood Hills, CA. Interment at the Enduring Faith section of Forest Lawn. A memorial service will be held in New York City at a future date. In lieu of flowers donations should be sent to the Stephen Harvey Memorial Fund, Greyston Foundation, 21 Park Ave., Yonkers, NY 10703 and/or Hospice of WinstonSalem, 1100 C South Stratford Road, Winston-Salem, NC 27103.
